items.sentence: Even though Tom has never even tried eating one, he says he doesn\'t like kiwifruit.
I\'m skeptical when I hear someone claim to speak more than five languages fluently.
I wanted to discuss this with you yesterday, but you didn\'t seem to want to listen.
The library near my house is now open only three days a week due to budget cutbacks.
The most dangerous thing Tom ever wanted to try to do was to hold a poisonous snake.
Tom and Mary adopted two children whose parents had been killed by a suicide bomber.
Tom and Mary relaxed in front of the TV for a couple of hours watching an old movie.
Tom put up with the pain for a couple of weeks before finally going to the hospital.
Tom wanted to stay in Boston for a few more days, but he had to get back to Chicago.
Tom wanted to stick around to see what would happen. Unfortunately, he had to leave.
When a woman is murdered, the husband or boyfriend is always the number one suspect.
Tom bought an engagement ring for Mary with money he inherited from his grandfather.
As soon as I can get a decent video camera, I\'ll start making videos to put online.
I have many friends who speak fluently, but still don\'t sound like native speakers.
Tom and Mary were speaking in French, so I had no idea what they were talking about.
Tom and Mary were in the middle of a heated argument when John walked into the room.
No matter how many people tell him he made a mistake, Tom still insists he\'s right.
Tom claims that he wasn\'t anywhere near the murder scene at the time of the murder.
Tom is usually the last to leave, but last night Mary left ten minutes after he did.
Tom\'s a very pessimistic person and always sees the negative side of any situation.
